Zyper.ai

Is a cutting edge 100% Generative AI Digital Marketing Platform that fully runs your Marketing, makes intelligent decisions, replacing manual teams.

Zyper grows your business 24x7, 365 days a year, Profitably and Predictably. It Never takes a break – Not on Holidays or post office hours

Delivers Up to 100% Better Return on Investment on Marketing Spend – Deploys Advanced Optimizations for the Smallest to Biggest Customers

Offers Free Trial Across All Basic Services

Focus on Core Business, Leave Marketing to Us

Spending so much time finding and managing resources? Team, agencies, freelancers, Designers, PPC & SEO experts? – Zyper consolidates it all for You. Zyper has all services in one platform – Simply complete business profile, enter your budgets and leave the rest to Us

Delivers Upto 100% Better Return on Paid Ads Investments

Zyper AI self optimizes RoAS (Return on Ad Spend) using entire suite of optimization tools available with Google, Facebook, Instagram, Tiktok and Listings, to deliver enterprise grade performance to even the smallest of Businesses

Quickest Website Build and Business Listings Setup for New Businesses & Startups

Complete your profile in 30 minutes and Zyper generates website, that is ready to host within 24 hours. It enables Google business listings, Google maps listings and other selected listings to make your business discoverable - Immediately. No need to set up multiple accounts and logins, everything enabled through a single login

Cross Channel Optimization of Budgets

Zyper uses ML models to automatically direct marketing budgets towards the highest performing paid channels for selected industry and geography. It is able to decide how much of your marketing budget to put on Instagram or Google or other ad platforms, based on advanced machine learning models, to deliver maximum impact

Superb Designs and Creatives, Tailored to Target Audience and Customers

Zyper APIs link to the largest stock designs, images and template databases worldwide, as well as to AI image & copy generators, to discover and embed creative, unique designs tailored to your target customers, demographics and messaging, across all your marketing channels
